Reviews.Content: stayed 4 nights january 2011 thoroughly recommend staying hotel excellent location corner seasons service amazing booked directly hotel taking advantage special offers included breakfast pick airport hotel hotel 7 renovated standard shown hotels website front desk restaurant theres available help breakfast buffet style theres selection theyre happy omelette youd lunch dinner drinks available day comfortable beds shower excellent bathrobes slippers provided theres safe flat screen tv lots channels youre worn sightseeing crash bit provide orange cupcakes sweets tea coffee theres bottled water etc fridge service absolutely amazing service ive stayed hotels honestly service alper team ive experienced family helpful trouble happily arranged half day cruise bosphorus golden horn tower hot drink snack cold ipod running power charged evenings sit drinking beers reading chatting alper owner speaks english mehmet barman speaks french english learning turkey people arrived stranger left feeling family location hotel city sultanahmet five minute walk aya sofya blue mosque topkapi palace archaeology museums lots restaurants numerous shops bazaars atms time turkish lira found euros accepted sites atms theres hard decide definitely recommend archaeology museums returned day wouldnt missed basilica cisterns nor bosphorus cruise basically 4 days wasnt spending time sultanahmet bazaar didnt rushing city city location hotel close hotel easy pop rest bit grab youve forgotten travelling solo travelling own wasnt safe feel istanbul answer safe hotel base helped advice friends people offering guided tours etc please wasnt didnt rude told ignore approached sightseeing advice noticed local women approach sailed past werent street hotel located people overall found turkish people spoke friendly helpful books read addition guidebooks barbara read harem crescent dawn set istanbul capturing city finally thanks alper bey team thank vacation wonderful
